channel.title: Matt Anger's Site
channel.description: Recent content on Matt Anger's Site

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hello! Welcome to my personal blog. I am a software engineer with over 15 years of industry experience and have worked with an extremely diverse array of companies, from enterprise data center systems to small consumer startups. I’ve worked at scale on data center switches pushing multiple Tbps and AdTech systems handing >1M QPS. Hopefully some of the things I’ve learned along the way can be helpful to others. Enjoy your stay!

item.title: My First Post
item.description: So this exists I am testing a new static site generator, because I didn’t like the old one. Hopefully I like this one more!
